datafield.subfield: proceedings of the Conference on Maritime-Port Technology (MTEC 2014), Trondheim, Norway, 27-29 October 2014 /

editors, Sören Ehlers & Bjørn Egil Asbjørnslett, Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU), Trondheim, Norway, Ørnulf Jan Rødseth & Tor Einar Berg, Norwegian Marine Technology Research Institute (MARINTEK), Trondheim, Norway.

Congestion and truck service time minimization in a container terminal / D. Ambrosino and C. Caballini -- A dynamic discrete berth allocation problem for container terminals / M.M. Gargari and M.S.F. Niasar -- Ontology based management of maritime rules and compliance / M. Hagaseth [and four others] -- Maritime single windows : lessons learned from the eMAR Project / I. Koliousis, P. Koliousis and T. Katsoulakos -- A study on estimation methodology of GHG emission from vessels by using energy efficiency index and time series monitoring data / T. Kano and S. Namie -- A pathway towards more sustainable shipping in 2050 : a possible future for automation and remote operations / G. Manno -- Ship retrofit solutions : economic, energy and environmental impacts / R. Aronietis, C. Sys and T. Vanelslander -- Model and simulation of operational energy efficiency for inland river ships / X. Sun, X.P. Yan and Q.Z. Yin -- Reinforcing existing port facilities to withstand natural disasters : an analysis of increased construction costs / K. Takahashi, Y. Kasugai and I. Fukuda -- Designing an autonomous collision avoidance controller respecting COLREG / H.-C. Burmeister and W. Bruhn -- A generic modelling approach for heavy lifting marine operations / J. Xu and K.H. Halse -- Model predictive control of a waterborne AGV at the operational level / H. Zheng, R.R. Negenborn and G. Lodewijks -- Estimation of dynamic positioning performance by time-domain simulations : a step toward safer operations / D.T. Nguyen, L. Pivano and Ø. Smogeli -- Possibilities to determine design loads for thrusters and drivetrain components using the flexible multibody-system method / B. Schlecht and T. Rosenlöcher -- Computational fluid dynamics simulations of propeller wake effects on seabed / V.T. Nguyen, H.H. Nguyen, J. Lou and L. Yde -- Enhanced electrochemical performance in merged olivine structured cathode materials / S. Saadat and R. Yazami -- Sea trials for validation of shiphandling simulation models : a case study / Ø. Selvik, T.E. Berg and S. Gavrilin -- Anti-corrosion method for marine steel structure by the calcareous deposits / T. Iwamoto [and four others] -- A risk based approach to the design of unmanned ship control systems / Ø.J. Rødseth and Å. Tjora -- Offshore upstream logistics for operations in arctic environment / A.-S. Milaković, S. Ehlers, M.H. Westvik and P. Schütz -- An evaluation of evacuation systems for arctic waters / O.E. Staalesen and S. Ehlers -- An approach towards the design of robust arctic maritime transport systems / M. Bergström, S. Ehlers and S.O. Erikstad -- Defining operational criteria for offshore vessels / T.E. Berg, Ø. Selvik and B.O. Berge -- Real time ship exhaust gas monitoring for compliance to SOx and NOx regulation and CO2 footprint / T. Wijaya, T. Tjahjowidodo and P. Thepsithar -- Modelling of LNG fuel systems for simulations of transient operations / E.L. Grotle, V. Æsøy and E. Pedersen -- Future internet enabled ship-port coordination / A. Rialland and Å. Tjora -- Ship port pre-arrival reporting and ship survey status as eMar services / E. Vanem, D. Yarmolenka and G. Korody.
